entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
